advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to disclose kernel memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.impact: Processing web content may lead to a denial-of-service
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read arbitrary files
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved validation of symlinks.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access contacts
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: Pan ZhenPeng (@Peterpan0927) of STAR Labs SG Pte. Ltd.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS before iOS 16.7.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Bill Marczak of The Citizen Lab at The University of Toronto's Munk School and Maddie Stone of Google's Threat Analysis Group

advisories.impact: An app may be able to access protected user data
advisories.description: An authorization issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to delete files for which it does not have permission
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

cves.credit: Zhipeng Huo (@R3dF09) of Tencent Security Xuanwu Lab (xlab.tencent.com)

advisories.impact: Processing web content may disclose sensitive information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

cves.credit: Adam M., and Wojciech Regula of SecuRing (wojciechregula.blog)

advisories.impact: An app may be able to overwrite arbitrary files
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.
